entry.string: Choose a translation to work on
entry.translation: Chuuse-a a trunsleshun tu vurk oon

entry.string: While working inside the translations module, you always work on the translation of one particular locale. You choose that locale below. It will activate the proper storage location for the translated items while you are working on a translation.
entry.translation: Vheele-a vurkeeng inseede-a zee trunsleshuns mudoole-a, yuoo elveys vurk oon zee trunsleshun ooff oone-a perteecooler lucele-a. Yuoo chuuse-a thet lucele-a beloo. It veell ecteefete-a zee pruper sturege-a luceshun fur zee trunsleted items vheele-a yuoo ere-a vurkeeng oon a trunsleshun.

entry.string: If you don't see the locale you want in the dropdown below, you will need to create it and activate it in the Modify Config page of the Base module.
entry.translation: Iff yuoo dun't see-a zee lucele-a yuoo vunt in zee drupdoon beloo, yuoo veell need tu creete-a it und ecteefete-a it in zee Mudeeffy Cunffeeg pege-a ooff zee Bese-a mudoole-a.
